member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_POSITION
member.summary: The DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_POSITION structure describes the position of the hardware cursor.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_POSITION.Position
member.summary: The position of the hardware cursor relative to the top-left of the adapter output.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_POSITION.Visible
member.summary: Specifies whether the hardware cursor is visible. TRUE if visible; otherwise, FALSE. If the hardware cursor is not visible, the calling application does not display the cursor in the client.
